summary: Improves potential followers by altering their their settings, inventories, and appearances.
descriptionHtml:
After releasing my first mod for Lydia, I encountered a few other potential followers that I felt also needed improvements. I searched Skyrim Nexus for awhile and found some great follower mods, but none gave me the exact changes that I wanted. So I decided to modify my own NPCs as I encountered them. This mod was made for personal use, however, I\'ve decided to share them with others in hopes that you may find use in them too. If you have any problems with this file, please let me know and I will try to fix them as soon as possible. If you have any suggestions, leave a comment, I\'ll see what I can do.

[b][color=limegreen][i]If you like the mod, remember to Endorse![/i][/color][/b]

[u]Change Log[/u]
1.0 Initial Release
1.1 Added Mjoll the Lioness
1.2 Added Aela the Huntress
1.3 Added Uthgerd the Unbroken
1.3beta Released Jordis to Sword-Maiden
1.5 added Jordis and the DB Female imitate to the main file.
1.5.1 fixed Uthgerd the Unbroken\'s aggression problem.

[b]Decription[/b]
Improves potential followers by altering their their settings, inventories, and appearances.

[u]Affected Followers[/u]
Lydia
Iona
Mjoll the Lioness
Aela the Huntress
Uthgerd the Unbroken
Jordis the Sword-Maiden
Dark Brotherhood Initiate (Female)
(More to come!)

[b][size=5]Lydia[/size][/b]
Now wears Fine Clothes by default.
Will steal anything and attack anyone.
Uses a more feminine stance.
Can cast Healing.
Magicka Recovery increased
Magic Resistance increased
Perk Avoid Death added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.
Perk Muffled Movement added.
Perk Power Shot added.
Perk Bullseye Paralyze added.


[u][b][size=2]Lydia\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
Iron Sword
Iron Banded Cuirass
Iron Boots & Gauntlets
Iron Banded Shield
Imperial Bow
50 Iron Arrows
A Mammoth Tusk
1 Torch
Restore Health Recipe
350 Gold

[b][size=5]Iona[/size][/b]
Changed Iona\'s Appearance. (See Screenshots)
Now wears Fine Clothes Variant by default.
Will steal anything and attack anyone.
Uses a more feminine stances.
Can cast healing.
Magicka Recovery increased
Magic Resistance increased
Perk Avoid Death added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.
Perk Muffled Movement added.
Perk Silence added.
Perk Power Shot added.
Perk Grand Master Paralyze added.

[u][b][size=2]Iona\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
Steel War Axe
Steel Cuirass
Steel Boots & Gauntlets
Steel Shield
10 Fire Salts
1 Torch
400 Gold

[b][size=5]Mjoll the Lioness[/size][/b]
Now wears hunter/fur armor by defalt.
Will steal anything and attack anyone.
Uses a more fiminine stance.
Can cast healing.
Perk Avoid Death added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.
Perk Muffled Movement added.
Perk Grand Master Paralyze added.
Perk War Master Knowckdown added.

[u][b][size=2]Mjoll\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
Aerin\'s House Key
Leveled Cure Potion
Leveled Battle Axe
Leveled Gold
Leveled Heavy Armor
Leveled Animal Parts
Leveled Restore Potions

[b][size=5]Aela the Huntress[/size][/b]
Now wears hunter armor variant by default.
Can cast Healing
Perk Avoid Death added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.
Perk Muffled Movements added.
Perk Wind Walker added.
Perk Silence added.

[u][b][size=2]Aela\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
1 Torch
Skyforge Steel Dagger
Hunting Bow
100 Steel Arrows
Leather Cuirass
Leather Boots & Gauntlets
Whiterun Main Gate Key
300 Gold

[b][size=5]Uthgerd the Unbroken[/size][/b]
Took about 20 years off of Uthgerd\'s face, she may still look a little rough, this is intentional.
Changed her default outfit. (See screenshots)
She\'s a little more aggressive now. (Careful with those accidental hits)
Ability Steed Standing Stone added.
Perk Avoid Death added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.
Perk Matching Set (Heavy Armor) added.
Increased Magic Resistance.

[u][b][size=2]Uthgerd\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
Ancient Nord Cuirass
Ancient Nord Boots & Gauntlets
Ancient Nord Helmet
Skyforge Steel Greatsword
Uthgerd\'s House-key
5 Orichalcum Ingot
Common Loot

[b][size=5]Jordis the Sword-Maiden[/size][/b]-[color=red]Beta[/color]
Now wears the Tavern Wench Outfit
Uses a more feminine stance
Will steal anything and attack anyone.
Can cast Healing
Can cast Oak Flesh
Increased Magicka Recovery
Increased Magicka Resistance (More than Lydia, less than Uthgerd)
Perk Avoid Death
Perk Extra Pockets
Perk Bash DIsarm
Perk Elemental Protection
Perk Riposte 
Perk Well Fitted
Perk Grandmaster Paralyze (One-handed weapons)

[u][b][size=2]Jordis\'s Inventory[/size][/b][/u]
Ebony Sword
Ebony Shield
1000 Gold

[b][size=5]Dark Brotherhood Initiate[/size][/b]
I removed the hood on her shrouded armor to reveal her face.
After I saw how horrible she looked, I decided to remodel... (See Screenshots)
She will now steal anything and attack anyone. (No idea why she wouldn\'t in the first place)
She can now cast healing.
Ability Steed Standing Stone added.
Perk Extra Pockets added.

She has an ebony dagger in her inventory, that\'s it.


[b][u][size=2]Batch Files[/size][/u][/b]
Main File: \"Bat follower\"
-Increases Magicka by 50-
-Increases Restoration skill by 50-
-Lydia can now be married-
\"Bat followeroff\" Removes these changes, you will still be able to marry Lydia.

Optional Iona: \"Bat iona\"
-Increases Magicka by 50-
-Increases Restoration skill by 50-
\"Bat ionaoff\" Removes these changes...

Optional Lydia: \"Bat lydia\"
-Increases Magicka by 50-
-Increases Restoration skill by 50-
-Lydia can now be married-
\"Bat lydiaoff\" Removes these changes, you will still be able to marry Lydia.

Optional Mjoll the Lioness: \"Bat mjoll\"
-Increases Magicka by 50-
-Increases Restoration skill by 50-
\"Bat mjolloff\" Removes these changes.

[u]Installation Instructions[/u]
Simply extract the archive into your data folder and activate the esp, via Skyrim Launcher.
The changes should take effect automatically once in-game.

To be certain. While in-game, open your console with the \"~\" key.
Select your follower, then type \"disable\" and press enter.
While still in the the console, type \"enable\".
Your follower should reappear in-game once you close the console.

Note: If one of the above NPCs is currently your follower, you may want to dismiss them before using the \"disable/enable\" commands.

[u]Uninstallation[/u]
Delete the \"AnotherFollowerMod\"esp file
Remove the 000a2c8e.nif & 000a2c91 file located in...
Data>Meshes>actors>character>facegendata>facegeom>skyrim.esm

I highly recommend using NMM or other mod managers for easy installation/uninstallation.


[u]Compatibility[/u]
This mod isn\'t compatible with other mods that make similar changes to above NPCs. If you wish to use this mod along side a mod that alters multiple NPCs, including the ones in this mod, simply make sure this mod is loaded AFTER similar mods in the Load Order.
author: Rinobi
